narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 1st pre-license inspection for a class "A" dealer license and exit briefing conducted with the owner.
The applicant is aware of the record keeping and identification rquirements.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The license fee of $120.00 is to be mailed to: 
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave. Bldg. B

Fort Collins, CO 80526
